models.description:
Faster-Whisper is an optimized reimplementation of OpenAI Whisper.
Uses CTranslate2 for faster inference with lower memory usage.
This serves as a production-optimized baseline for ASR comparison.

declared_capabilities.notes: Optimized Whisper implementation for faster inference with minimal accuracy loss.

models.description: Heuristic diarizer extending Silero VAD with single-speaker assumption.

declared_capabilities.notes: Baseline for pipeline verification. Assumes 1 speaker max.

models.description: LFM-2.5-Audio is a multi-modal model for audio understanding and generation.

recommended_usage: For V2V: use interleaved generation (real-time mode)

declared_capabilities.notes: Designed for dialogue understanding, not verbatim transcription.
Functional text-to-speech, but optimized for stability over expressivity.

deployment.notes: Desktop/Server only. Mobile not supported natively at 1.5B params.

notes: MPS works well on Apple Silicon (via workaround)
CPU inference is possible but slow

known_issues: Requires patched harness for MPS support (detokenizer fix)

models.description: Pre-trained enterprise-grade Voice Activity Detection (VAD) model.

Whisper is a general-purpose speech recognition model.
Trained on 680,000 hours of multilingual data.
Production-grade baseline for ASR comparison.

declared_capabilities.notes: Implicit alignment via high-quality timestamp generation.

deployment.notes: Mobile only via server API; local mobile not feasible due to model size.

notes: MPS works well on Apple Silicon

known_issues: Requires ffmpeg for some audio formats

notes: Uses AVX/NEON SIMD for fast CPU inference
